content: Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us for the Red Cat Holdings fiscal 2023 second quarter financial results and corporate update conference call. Joining us today from Red Cat Holdings are Jeff Thompson, Chief Executive Officer; and Joseph Hernon, Chief Financial Officer  During this call, management will be making forward-looking statements including statements that address Red Catâs expectations for future performance or operational results.
